text: Celestial Masters: Master of the Way
Vulgar people do not attain good merit; they die and belong to the officers of the Earth. This is to perish.
Dying but never perishing, this is long-life.
If one is a king, one will be heavenly; if one is heavenly, one will be with the Way; if one is with the Way, one will be long-lived; until the end of one's days one will not meet with danger.
Heaven endures, and the Earth lives long.
One who conquers others is strong. One who conquers oneself is all powerful.
[[b]] Celestial Masters [[/b]] can be gained by winning battles, casualities of enemies, settlement actions, and select buildings.
[[b]] Celestial Masters [[/b]] can be loss by losing battles, casualities of your units, settlement actions, and select buildings
